title: What are the list of open source projects contributed and maintained by Microsoft? - Quora

response.answer_text: Wow, there is quite the list. Over the past few years, Microsoft has open sourced, the .NET Framework, .NET Core, ASP.NET Core, Entity Framework Core, ML.NET (Machine Learning Framework), Windows Forms, WPF etc. The list is quite extensive. You can check them out here PS: The .NET Foundation is an independent organization from Microsoft but receives a large grant from Microsoft and a lot of the projects it runs were former Microsoft technologies or are related in one way or another.
